function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate cleaning and maintenance of built environment contributing to disease transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread within buildings and facilities","Mitigation":"Implementation of rigorous cleaning protocols and regular maintenance schedules","Technologies":"Advanced cleaning technologies and monitoring systems","People":"Building occupants, visitors, staff","Owner":"Facility management, cleaning and maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Lack of awareness and understanding of disease transmission factors in the built environment","Impact":"Failure to implement effective measures to prevent disease spread","Mitigation":"Education and training on disease transmission and control measures","Technologies":"Training programs, informational materials","People":"Building occupants, facility management, cleaning staff","Owner":"Health organizations, facility management"}]}
